trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is a bookmark that has a unique name, exposes events, and can be bound to data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件是一个具有唯一名称且用于公开事件的书签，可以绑定到数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddBookmark%2A> method to add a bookmark to a document range.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddBookmark%2A>方法将添加到文档范围的书签。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> that represents the creator of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示该 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> 控件的创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> that represents the creator of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的创建者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets, and then displays in a message box, the name and version of the application in which the bookmark appears.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码示例获取和显示在一个消息框中，名称和版本的应用程序，该书签会显示。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Automatically formats a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 自动设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的格式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 当在默认的双击操作之前双击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Double-clicking overlapping <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> controls raises the event on each of the bookmarks that overlap.
trans-unit.target: 双击重叠<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件会引发该事件在每个重叠书签。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with the text to the document and then creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BeforeDoubleClick> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>到文档的文本与控件，然后创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BeforeDoubleClick>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The text within the bookmark is selected when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 选择书签中的文本时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>双击控件时。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 当在默认的右击操作之前右击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Right-clicking overlapping <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> controls raises the event on each of the bookmarks that overlap.
trans-unit.target: 右键单击重叠<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件会引发该事件在每个重叠书签。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BeforeRightClick> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>到文档控件，然后创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BeforeRightClick>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is right-clicked, the text within the bookmark is copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件处于右键单击时，该书签中的文本复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext" /> property of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext" /> 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext%2A> property is changed is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the purpose of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息有关的用途<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is formatted as bold.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的格式是否设置为粗体。

trans-unit.source: 0 if none of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is bold; -1 if all of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is bold; <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> (999999) if part of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is bold.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的任何文本都不是粗体，则为 0；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有文本都是粗体，则为 -1；如果 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> 控件中的部分文本是粗体，则为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> (999999)。

trans-unit.source: The values this property can be set to are 0, -1, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为的值是 0，-1，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then applies formatting to the bookmark based on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> of the text within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制对该文档，然后将应用格式设置为基于书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>在书签内的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is formatted as bold.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的格式是否设置为粗体。

trans-unit.source: 0 if none of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is bold; 1 if all of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is bold; <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> (999999) if part of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is bold.
trans-unit.target: 如果无中的文本 0<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />控件是粗体; 1 如果中的文本的所有<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />控件为粗体;<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> (999999) 中的文本的一部分<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />控件为粗体。

trans-unit.source: The values this property can be set to are 0, 1, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为值为 0、 1、 和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BoldBi%2A> property applies to text in a right-to-left language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BoldBi%2A>属性适用于从右到左语言中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then applies formatting to the bookmark based on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> of the text within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制对该文档，然后将应用格式设置为基于书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>在书签内的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件在文档中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件在文档中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number corresponds to the order of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control in the document: 1 for the first bookmark, 2 for the second one, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 该数字对应的顺序到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>文档中的控件： 第一个书签的 1，2 代表第二个中，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: If one of the bookmarks is deleted, then the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BookmarkID%2A> of the other bookmarks will renumber accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一个书签被删除，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BookmarkID%2A>的其他书签将相应地重新编号。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then displays the position of the bookmark in the document by showing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BookmarkID%2A> in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到文档，然后通过显示文档中显示的位置的书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BookmarkID%2A>消息框中。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> collection that represents all the bookmarks inside of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件内的所有书签。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> collection that represents all the bookmarks inside of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件内的所有书签。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to enumerate each <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control in the document using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 不能枚举每个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>在文档中使用的控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> and then look for items of type <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>，然后查找类型的项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then adds another bookmark to the sixth character of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为到文档的文本，然后将另一个书签添加书签的第六个字符。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bookmarks found within the bookmark is then displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后在消息框中显示该书签中找到的书签的总数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Borders" /> collection that represents all the borders for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Borders" /> collection that represents all the borders for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Borders" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的所有边框。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text and then adds a border to the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为文本，然后将边框添加到该书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a mathematical expression within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 计算 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的数学表达式。

trans-unit.source: The result of the calculation of the mathematical expression within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的数学表达式的计算结果。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control contains errors, this method displays the **Spelling and Grammar** dialog box, with the **Check grammar** check box selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包含错误，则此方法会显示**拼写和语法**对话框中，与**检查语法**复选框处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCharacterCase" /> constant that represents the case of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCharacterCase" /> 常数，该常数表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的大小写。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCharacterCase" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCharacterCase" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text and then changes the text to upper case.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有文本控件并将文本然后更改为大写形式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Cells" /> collection that represents the table cells in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Cells" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的表单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Cells" /> collection that represents the table cells in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Cells" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的表单元格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a three-column, three-row table to the document, then adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将三个列中，三行的表添加到文档中，然后添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>到表的控件。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code changes the width of the table cells within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 最后，代码将更改该书签中的表单元格的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的字符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> collection that represents the characters in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的字符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then adds another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the sixth character of the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到文档的文本，然后添加另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签的第六个字符。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bookmarks found within the bookmark are then displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 在消息框中将显示该书签中找到的书签的总数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style that is used to format one or more characters in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的一个或多个字符的格式的样式。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style that is used to format one or more characters in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的一个或多个字符的格式的样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character width of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的字符宽度。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCharacterWidth" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCharacterWidth" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text and then changes the character width of the text to half-width characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有文本控件然后更改文本的字符宽度的半角字符。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Begins a spelling and grammar check for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 开始对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件进行拼写和语法检查。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of the custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if capitalization is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.IgnoreUppercase" /> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.IgnoreUppercase" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> for Microsoft Office Word to always suggest alternative spellings.
trans-unit.target: 如果要让 Microsoft Office Word 始终建议替代拼写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SuggestSpellingCorrections" /> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SuggestSpellingCorrections" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of an additional custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是附加的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: You can specify as many as nine additional dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 您最多可以指定九个附加字典。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of an additional custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是附加的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: You can specify as many as nine additional dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 您最多可以指定九个附加字典。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of an additional custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是附加的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Begins a spelling check for the document from the start of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the end of the document.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的开始处到文档末尾开始对文档进行拼写检查。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control contains errors, this method displays the **Spelling and Grammar** dialog box, with the **Check grammar** check box cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包含错误，则此方法会显示**拼写和语法**对话框中，与**检查语法**清除复选框。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then checks the spelling of the text in the document, from the start of the bookmark to the end of the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为文本与文档，然后检查在文档中，从书签的起始位置到文档末尾的文本的拼写。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Displays the **Thesaurus** dialog box, which lists alternative word choices, or synonyms, for the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示“同义词库”对话框，其中列出了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中文本的替代词语选择或同义词。

trans-unit.source: The direction in which to collapse the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 折叠 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 的方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseEnd" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseStart" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseEnd" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseStart" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseStart" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseStart" />。

trans-unit.source: Collapses a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the starting or ending position.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件折叠到起始或结束位置。

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is collapsed, the starting and ending points are equal.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件处于折叠状态、 开始和结束点是否相等。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseEnd> to collapse a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control that refers to an entire paragraph, the range is located after the ending paragraph mark (the beginning of the next paragraph).
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCollapseDirection.wdCollapseEnd>折叠<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>指整个段落，范围的控件位于之后结束段落标记 （下一段的开头）。

trans-unit.source: However, you can move the range back one character by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.MoveEnd%2A> method after the range of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以移动范围使用备份一个字符<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.MoveEnd%2A>方法之后的范围<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件处于折叠状态。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text, and then displays the start and end position of the bookmark before and after collapsing the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有文本，然后显示的开始和结束位置的书签之前和之后折叠书签控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is a table column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件是否为表列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is a table column; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件为表列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Columns" /> collection that represents all the table columns in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Columns" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有表列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Columns" /> collection that represents all the table columns in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Columns" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有表列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a three-column, three-row table to the document, adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the table, then changes the width of the first column within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向文档添加一个三列三行的表，添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件到表中，然后将更改该书签中的第一列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control contains combined characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件是否包含组合字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control contains combined characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件包含组合字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> collection that represents all the comments in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有注释。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> collection that represents all the comments in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有注释。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document, and then inserts a comment into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>使用来控制向该文档，然后插入文本注释插入书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdStatistic" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdStatistic" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a statistic based on the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的内容的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: A statistic based on the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 基于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的内容的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text and then displays the total number of characters in the bookmark using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ComputeStatistics%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有文本控件，然后在书签中使用显示的字符总数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ComputeStatistics%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the co-authoring conflicts in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的所有共同创作冲突。

trans-unit.source: The co-authoring conflicts in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的共同创作冲突。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in co-authoring enabled documents.
trans-unit.target: 可以仅在共同创作启用的文档中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to access this property on a document that is not enabled for co-authoring, you will receive a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试访问此属性的文档中未启用共同创作，你将收到<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Co-authoring is not enabled in the document that contains the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 包含书签的文档中未启用共同创作。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content controls that are contained in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中包含的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 中的内容控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Sets the direction for the conversion between Hangul and Hanja.
trans-unit.target: 设置朝鲜文字与朝鲜文汉字之间的转换方向。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode.wdHangulToHanja" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode.wdHanjaToHangul" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode.wdHangulToHanja" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode.wdHanjaToHangul" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.MultipleWordConversionsMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.MultipleWordConversionsMode" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word automatically converts a word with only one suggestion for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 仅用一种转换建议来进行自动转换，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.HangulHanjaFastConversion" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.HangulHanjaFastConversion" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word automatically detects Hangul endings and ignores them.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Word 自动检测朝鲜文字结尾并忽略它们，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckHangulEndings" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckHangulEndings" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: This argument is ignored if the <c>ConversionsMode</c> argument is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode.wdHanjaToHangul" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>ConversionsMode</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMultipleWordConversionsMode.wdHanjaToHangul" />，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word displays the most recently used words at the top of the suggestions list.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Word 在建议列表顶部显示最近使用过的单词，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.EnableHangulHanjaRecentOrdering" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.EnableHangulHanjaRecentOrdering" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: The name of a custom Hangul-Hanja conversion dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 自定义朝鲜文字-朝鲜文汉字转换字典的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use this argument in order to use a custom dictionary with Hangul-Hanja conversions not contained in the main dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 使用此参数以便对主字典中所不包含的朝鲜文字-朝鲜文汉字转换使用自定义字典。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control text from Hangul to Hanja or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件文本从朝鲜文字转换为朝鲜文汉字，或从朝鲜文汉字转换为朝鲜文字。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph in the document, then checks if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> of the bookmark is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID.wdKorean>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件在文档中的第一个段落，然后检查是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>的书签是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID.wdKorean>。

trans-unit.source: If so, it converts the bookmark from Hangul to Hanja or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，它将书签转换从朝鲜文字转换为 Hanja，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character used to separate text into cells.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于将文本分隔成单元格的字符。

trans-unit.source: Can be a character or one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByCommas" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByDefaultListSeparator" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByParagraphs" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByTabs" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个字符或以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByCommas" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByDefaultListSeparator" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByParagraphs" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFieldSeparator.wdSeparateByTabs" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.DefaultTableSeparator" /> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.DefaultTableSeparator" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: 表中的行数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Word sets the number of rows, based on the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 根据 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的内容设置行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: 表中的列数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Word sets the number of columns, based on the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Word 根据 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的内容设置列数。

trans-unit.source: The initial width of each column, in points.
trans-unit.target: 每一列的初始宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Word calculates and adjusts the column width so that the table stretches from margin to margin.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Word 计算并调整列宽度，以便表在边距间拉伸。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of the predefined formats listed in the **Table AutoFormat** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 指定“表格自动套用格式”对话框中列出的预定义格式之一。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFormat" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFormat" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the border properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的边框属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the shading properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的底纹属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the font properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the color properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的颜色属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the heading-row properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的标题行属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the last-row properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的最后一行属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the first-column properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的第一列属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the last-column properties of the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则应用指定格式的最后一列属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to decrease the width of the table columns as much as possible without changing the way text wraps in the cells.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则在不更改单元格中的文本换行方式的情况下尽可能地缩小表列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the AutoFit rules for how Word sizes a table.
trans-unit.target: 设置规定 Word 如何调整表大小的自动调整规则。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior.wdAutoFitContent" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior.wdAutoFitFixed" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior.wdAutoFitWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior.wdAutoFitContent" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior.wdAutoFitFixed" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoFitBehavior.wdAutoFitWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>DefaultTableBehavior</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior.wdWord8TableBehavior" />, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>DefaultTableBehavior</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior.wdWord8TableBehavior" />，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value that specifies whether Word automatically resizes cells in a table to fit the contents (AutoFit).
trans-unit.target: 设置一个值，该值指定 Word 是否自动调整表中单元格的大小以适合内容（自动调整）。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior.wdWord8TableBehavior" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior.wdWord9TableBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior.wdWord8TableBehavior" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDefaultTableBehavior.wdWord9TableBehavior" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts text within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to a table.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本转换为表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then converts the text in the bookmark to a table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为文本与文档，然后将书签到表中的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> in the same location as the existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在与现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件相同的位置上创建一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: The new bookmark is a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> object rather than a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 新书签将变为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>对象而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BeforeRightClick> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>到文档控件，然后创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BeforeRightClick>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is right-clicked, the text within the bookmark is copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件处于右键单击时，该书签中的文本复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 新书签的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> with the specified <paramref name="Name" /> argument in the same location as the existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="Name" /> 参数，在与现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件相同的位置创建一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The new bookmark is a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> object rather than a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 新书签将变为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>对象而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph, then copies the bookmark to the same location as the original bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件与文本发送到第一个段落，然后将该书签复制到与原始书签相同的位置。

trans-unit.source: A message box displays the type and location of each bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 一个消息框显示类型和每个书签的位置。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.CopyAsPicture" /> method copies the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.CopyAsPicture" /> 方法将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的内容复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is created in Microsoft Office Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建控件，则此属性返回的十六进制数 4d535744，它表示字符串"MSWD。"

trans-unit.source: This value can also be represented by the constant <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>.
trans-unit.target: 此值也可以表示由常数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph of the document and then displays the creator application in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换的文档和显示的第一个段落的文本消息框中的创建者应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Removes the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control from the document and places it in the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的内容，并将其放入剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control are cut to the Clipboard but the collapsed <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control remains in the document.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件剪切到剪贴板，但折叠<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件保留在文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 的默认 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.Never</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.Never</c>。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in cases where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> without a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> value specified is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在情况下使用此属性其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>而无需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>指定值添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.DataBindings%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a dynamically created <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> from the document and removes it from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从该文档中删除动态创建的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 并将其从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used with a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control that is created programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅应该用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>在运行时以编程方式创建的控件。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you call this method on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control that is added to the document at design time.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用此方法引发异常<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>在设计时添加到文档的控制。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> are not deleted from the document.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>不会从文档中删除。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text in the document, changes the style to `Heading 1`, and then deletes the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件以在文档中的文本将样式更改为`Heading 1`，然后删除该书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when selection moves from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to an area outside of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当所选内容从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件移到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件外部的区域时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control has focus, and then focus is transferred away from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件仅当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件具有焦点，并且然后将焦点移远离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph of the document and creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Deselected> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为文档的第一个段落的文本，并创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Deselected>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A message box is displayed when the user moves the cursor from inside the bookmark to an area outside of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将光标从内部书签到书签以外的区域，显示一个消息框。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Analyzes the text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to determine the language that it is written in.
trans-unit.target: 分析 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的文本，以确定编写该文本所用的语言。

trans-unit.source: The results of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.DetectLanguage%2A> method are stored in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A> property on a character-by-character basis.
trans-unit.target: 结果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.DetectLanguage%2A>方法存储在<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A>基于字符的字符的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.DetectLanguage%2A> method has already been applied to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.DetectLanguage%2A>方法已应用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: To re-evaluate the language of the text of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control, you must first set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 重新计算的文本的语言<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件，则必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word ignores the number of characters per line for the corresponding <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否忽略相应的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的每行字符数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word ignores the number of characters per line for the corresponding <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 忽略相应 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件每行的字符数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> associated with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与该 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 控件关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> associated with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph in the document and then displays the name of the document containing the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制显示和文档中的第一个段落包含书签的文档的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents all the properties of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents all the properties of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: You can assign the object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Duplicate%2A> property to another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> to apply those settings all at once.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将返回的对象分配<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Duplicate%2A>到另一个属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>若要在一次应用这些设置。

trans-unit.source: Before assigning the duplicate object to another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>, you can change any of the properties of the duplicate object without affecting the original.
trans-unit.target: 然后再将重复的对象分配到另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>，可以更改任何重复的对象的属性而不影响原始。

trans-unit.source: By duplicating a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> object, you can change the starting or ending character position of the duplicate range without changing the original range.
trans-unit.target: 通过复制<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>对象，你可以更改开始点或而无需更改的原始范围结束的重复的范围的字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and sets the text to bold.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到第一个段落的文本控件并设置要用粗体显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: It then returns a range from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Duplicate%2A> property of the Bookmark and displays a message box indicating that the range contains the same properties as the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它返回介于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Duplicate%2A>属性书签并显示消息框，指示的范围包含与书签相同的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editors" /> object that represents all the users authorized to modify a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control within a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editors" /> 对象，该对象表示获得修改文档中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的授权的所有用户。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editors" /> object that represents all the users authorized to modify a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control within a document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editors" /> 对象，表示获得修改文档中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的授权的所有用户。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph in the document and adds all users as editors of the fourth word in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制与在文档中的第一个段落的文本，并添加作为在书签中的第四个单词的编辑器的所有用户。

trans-unit.source: The example then protects the document against revisions and displays the editable range of the bookmark in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 示例然后保护该文档不被修订，并在消息框中显示的书签的可编辑范围。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the emphasis mark for a character or designated character string within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的字符或指定字符字符串的强调标记。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEmphasisMark" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEmphasisMark" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.EmphasisMark%2A> on the bookmark to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEmphasisMark.wdEmphasisMarkOverComma>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到第一个段落，然后设置的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.EmphasisMark%2A>到书签上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEmphasisMark.wdEmphasisMarkOverComma>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件是否为空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件为空，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control marks a location (a collapsed selection); it does not mark any text.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件标记的位置 （折叠选定内容）; 它不会将标记任何文本。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发异常<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件不存在。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks.Exists%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control exists.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks.Exists%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The ending character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control has a starting position and an ending position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件具有的起始位置和结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The ending position is the point farthest away from the beginning of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 结束的位置是远的开始点<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A> property to change the size of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A>属性可以更改的大小<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value smaller than the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A> property, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A> property is set to the same value (that is, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A> property are equal).
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为一个值小于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A>属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A>属性设置为相同的值 (即，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A>属性相等)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then adds another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the third word in the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到第一个段落的文本，然后添加另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then moves the range of the second bookmark until it finds the character K.
trans-unit.target: 该代码然后移动第二个的书签的范围，直到它找到的字符 k。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.EndnoteOptions" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的尾注。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.EndnoteOptions" /> object that represents the endnotes in <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.EndnoteOptions" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的尾注。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the starting number of endnotes within the bookmark to 5 and the style of the number to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>5 到该书签中尾注的起始编号和样式的数字的控件替换为文本的第一个段落，然后集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> collection that represents all the endnotes in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有尾注。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> collection that represents all the endnotes in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有尾注。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the starting number of endnotes within the bookmark to 5 and the style of the number to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>5 到该书签中尾注的起始编号和样式的数字的控件替换为文本的第一个段落，然后集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The unit by which to move the ending character position.
trans-unit.target: 移动结束字符位置所依据的单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnits" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnits" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMovementType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMovementType" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves or extends the ending character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the end of the nearest text unit.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束字符位置移动或扩展到最近的文本单元的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The number of character positions the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> was extended.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 扩展的字符位置数。

trans-unit.source: If both the starting and ending positions for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control are already at the end of the unit, this method does not move or extend the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时起始和结束位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件已位于单位的末尾，则此方法不移动或扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: It then extends the bookmark by one word.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它会通过一个字扩展书签。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph, then inserts a sentence after the bookmark and extends the bookmark to include the new sentence.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件与文本发送到第一个段落，然后将插入该书签之后一个句子，并扩展包括新的句子的书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportFormat" /> values that specifies whether to save the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportFormat" /> 值之一，指定是以 PDF 还是 XPS 格式保存 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open the new file after exporting the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 后打开新文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportOptimizeFor" /> values that specifies whether to optimize for screen or print.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportOptimizeFor" /> 值之一，指定进行屏幕优化还是打印优化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to export the entire page; <see langword="false" /> to export only the current selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果导出整个页面，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果仅导出当前选定内容，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportItem" /> values that specifies whether the export process includes text only or includes text with markup.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportItem" /> 值之一，指定导出过程是仅包括文本，还是同时包括文本和标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the newly exported file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在新导出的文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to copy Information Rights Management (IRM) permissions to an XPS document if the source document has IRM protections; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在源文档具有信息权限管理 (IRM) 保护时将 IRM 权限复制到 XPS 文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportCreateBookmarks" /> values that specifies whether to export bookmarks and the type of bookmarks to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportCreateBookmarks" /> 值之一，指定是否导出书签以及要导出的书签类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include extra data to help screen readers, such as information about the flow and logical organization of the content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含额外数据（如有关内容的流和逻辑组织的信息）来协助使用屏幕读取器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include a bitmap of the text; <see langword="false" /> to reference the text font.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含文本的位图，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要引用文本字体，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this parameter to <see langword="true" /> when font licenses do not permit a font to be embedded in the PDF file.
trans-unit.target: 如果字体许可证不允许在 PDF 文件中嵌入某种字体，则将此参数设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this to <see langword="false" />, the viewer's computer substitutes an appropriate font if the specified one is not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 <see langword="false" />，则当指定字体不可用时，查看者的计算机会替换合适的字体。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to limit PDF usage to the PDF subset standardized as ISO 19005-1; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将 PDF 使用范围限制为按照 ISO 19005-1 进行标准化的 PDF 子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this parameter to <see langword="true" />, the resulting files are more reliably self-contained but may be larger or show more visual artifacts due to the restrictions of the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 <see langword="true" />，则生成的文件会是更加可靠的独立文件，但这些文件可能会更大，或者由于格式限制而显示更多的视觉瑕疵。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the bookmark to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指针，指向使书签能够以其他固定格式保存的 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Saves the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Word only after you install an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Word 外接程序计算机上安装。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the file in which to save the document fragment.
trans-unit.target: 在其中保存文档片段的文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat" /> values that specifies the file format of the document fragment file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat" /> 值之一，指定文档片段文件的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: You can save a document fragment in any format that Microsoft Office Word supports.
trans-unit.target: 可以采用 Microsoft Office Word 支持的任何格式来保存文档片段。

trans-unit.source: Exports the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> to a document for use as a document fragment.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 导出到文档用作文档片段。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> collection that represents all the fields in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> collection that represents all the fields in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有字段。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为文本的第一个段落，然后在书签的末尾添加日期字段。
