trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width (in the current measurement units) in which Microsoft Office Word fits the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 适合 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的宽度（以当前度量单位表示）。

trans-unit.source: The width (in the current measurement units) in which Microsoft Office Word fits the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 适合 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的宽度（以当前度量单位表示）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph, then changes the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.FitTextWidth%2A> property to one inch.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件与文本发送到第一个段落，然后将更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.FitTextWidth%2A>为一英寸的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Font" /> object that represents the character formatting of the text assigned to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Font" /> 对象，该对象表示分配给一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的文本的字符格式设置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Font" /> object that represents the character formatting of the text assigned to a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Font" /> 对象，表示分配给一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的文本的字符格式设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph, then changes the font color of the bookmark to blue.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件与文本发送到第一个段落，然后将更改为蓝色的书签的字体颜色。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FootnoteOptions" /> object that represents the footnotes in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FootnoteOptions" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的脚注。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FootnoteOptions" /> object that represents the footnotes in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FootnoteOptions" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的脚注。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the starting number of footnotes within the bookmark to 1 and the style of the number to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>脚注 1 到书签中的起始数目和样式的数字的控件替换为文本的第一个段落，然后集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>。

trans-unit.source: It then inserts a footnote beneath the bookmark text.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将插入脚注书签文本的下方。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Footnotes" /> collection that represents all the footnotes in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Footnotes" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有脚注。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the starting number of footnotes within the bookmark to 1 and the style of the number to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>脚注 1 到书签中的起始数目和样式的数字的控件替换为文本的第一个段落，然后集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNoteNumberStyle.wdNoteNumberStyleArabic>。

trans-unit.source: It then inserts a footnote beneath the bookmark text.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将插入脚注书签文本的下方。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that includes the formatted text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，该对象包括 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的格式化文本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that includes the formatted text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，包括 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的格式化文本。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the text in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is replaced with formatted text.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性中的文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件被替换为带格式文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inserts text into the first paragraph and then formats the third word as bold.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本插入的第一个段落，然后格式化为加粗第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: It then copies the third word (with formatting) to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 然后将第三个单词 （带格式设置） 复制到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and then adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFieldType.wdFieldFormCheckBox> to the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件的第一个段落，然后添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFieldType.wdFieldFormCheckBox>到书签。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为到文档的文本，然后将帧添加到书签。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of the custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore words in all uppercase letters.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则忽略全部是大写字母的单词。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.IgnoreUppercase" /> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.IgnoreUppercase" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of the main dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是主字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a main dictionary, Microsoft Office Word uses the main dictionary that corresponds to the language formatting of the first word in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定主字典，则 Microsoft Office Word 使用对应于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的第一个单词的语言格式设置的主字典。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the way Word makes spelling suggestions.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Word 提供拼写建议的方式。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdAnagram" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdSpellword" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdWildcard" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdAnagram" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdSpellword" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdWildcard" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdSpellword" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSpellingWordType.wdSpellword" />。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of an additional custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是附加的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: You can specify as many as nine additional dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 您最多可以指定九个附加字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.SpellingSuggestions" /> collection that represents the words suggested as spelling replacements for the first word in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.SpellingSuggestions" /> 集合，该集合表示建议作为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的第一个单词的拼写替换的单词。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.SpellingSuggestions" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with misspelled text to the first paragraph and then displays the first spelling suggestion in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>拼写错误的文本，然后显示在第一个段落与使用来控制在消息框中的第一个拼写建议。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The kind of item for which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 中检索的项的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: The item for which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> is retrieved Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 中检索的项可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection" /> 常数之一。

trans-unit.source: The number of the item in the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档中项的编号。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Only positive values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 只有正数值才有效。

trans-unit.source: To specify an item that precedes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control, use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection.wdGoToPrevious" /> as the <c>Which</c> argument and specify a <c>Count</c> value.
trans-unit.target: 要指定位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之前的项，请使用 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection.wdGoToPrevious" /> 作为 <c>Which</c> 参数，并指定一个 <c>Count</c> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>What</c> argument is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToBookmark" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToComment" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToField" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToObject" />, this argument specifies a name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>What</c> 参数是 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToBookmark" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToComment" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToField" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToObject" />，则此参数指定一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents the start position of an item within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中某个项的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoTo%2A> method with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError> constant, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> that is returned includes any grammar error text or spelling error text.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoTo%2A>方法替换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError>常量，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>返回包括任何语法错误的文本或拼写错误的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inserts a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with misspelled text to the first paragraph then goes to the first spelling error in the bookmark and displays its position in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中插入<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有拼写错误的第一个段落的文本控件然后将转到在书签中的第一个拼写错误，并显示在一个消息框中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Can be a string that represents the e-mail alias of the user (if in the same domain), an e-mail address, or a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> constant that represents a group of users.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个表示用户的电子邮件别名的字符串（如果在同一域中）、一个电子邮件地址或一个表示一组用户的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, selects all ranges for which all users have permissions to edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则选择所有用户都有权限编辑的所有范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents an area of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control that can be modified by the user or group of users.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示可由用户或用户组修改的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents an area of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control that can be modified by the user or group of users.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，表示可由用户或用户组修改的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的区域。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph in the document and adds all users as editors of the fourth word in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制与在文档中的第一个段落的文本，并添加作为在书签中的第四个单词的编辑器的所有用户。

trans-unit.source: The example then protects the document against revisions.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例将保护该文档不被修订版本。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code displays the editable range of the bookmark in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该代码可显示消息框中的书签的可编辑范围。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that refers to the start position of the next item or location within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control specified by the <paramref name="What" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，该对象表示由 <paramref name="What" /> 参数指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中下一项或位置的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that refers to the start position of the next item or location within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control specified by the <paramref name="What" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，表示由 <paramref name="What" /> 参数指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中下一项或位置的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError> constant, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range> object that is returned includes any grammar error text or spelling error text.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError>常量，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range>返回的对象包括任何语法错误的文本或拼写错误的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document, and then adds comments to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为到该文档中的文本，然后将注释添加到文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document, and then adds comments to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为到该文档中的文本，然后将注释添加到文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a grammar check has been run on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件执行了语法检查。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a grammar check has been run on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件运行了语法检查，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To recheck the grammar in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GrammarChecked%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 以重新检查中的语法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制、 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GrammarChecked%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the sentences that failed the grammar check on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，该集合表示对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件进行语法检查失败的句子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the sentences that failed the grammar check on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，表示对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 进行语法检查失败的句子。

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one error per sentence.
trans-unit.target: 可以有多个错误，每个句子。

trans-unit.source: If there are no grammatical errors, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors.Count%2A> property for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors> object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GrammaticalErrors%2A> property returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何语法错误，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors.Count%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors>返回对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GrammaticalErrors%2A>属性都返回 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then runs the grammar checker if there are grammatical errors in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>带到第一个段落，然后运行文本控制语法检查程序，如果在书签中有语法错误。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the highlight color for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的突出显示颜色。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdColorIndex" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdColorIndex" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdColorIndex.wdNoHighlight> removes the highlight color (if any) from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdColorIndex.wdNoHighlight>从 （如果有） 中的突出显示颜色移除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.HighlightColorIndex%2A> of the third word in the bookmark to yellow.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到第一个段落，然后设置的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.HighlightColorIndex%2A>为黄色书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlinks" /> collection that represents all the hyperlinks in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifying label for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control when the current document is saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在将当前文档另存为网页时 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的标识标签。

trans-unit.source: The identifying label for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control when the current document is saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在将当前文档另存为网页时 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的标识标签。

trans-unit.source: This is different from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BookmarkID%2A> property, and does not imply the order the bookmark appears in the document.
trans-unit.target: 这是不同于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.BookmarkID%2A>属性，并不表示订单书签显示文档中。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the full path of the document fragment to import.
trans-unit.target: 指定要导入的文档片段的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to match the destination formatting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要与目标格式设置相匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <see langword="false" />, the imported document fragment retains the formatting in the original document.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定为 <see langword="false" />，则导入的文档片段会保留原始文档中的格式设置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Imports a document fragment into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 将文档片段导入到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the contents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的内容替换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>。

trans-unit.source: To stop this from occurring, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Collapse%2A> method before using this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止这发生，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Collapse%2A>方法，然后才能使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides information about the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Information%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Information%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdInformation> values that specifies the type of information returned for the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdInformation>为该书签返回指定的信息类型的值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Information%2A> property without specifying a parameter, it returns an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark_InformationType> object that not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Information%2A>未指定参数的属性，它返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark_InformationType>不应在代码中直接使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Information%2A> property to display the page number in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有为文档，然后使用的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Information%2A>属性在消息框中显示页码。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
