trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShapes" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> 控件中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShapes" /> collection that represents all the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> objects in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShapes" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> 控件中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then adds a horizontal line to the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制对文档，然后将水平行添加到该书签。

trans-unit.source: The code then displays the total number of inline shapes the bookmark contains in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，代码将显示书签包含在消息框中的内联形状的总数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> object of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的基础 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> host control to a method or property that expects the underlying object (a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 不能将传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>主机到方法或属性需要基础对象的控件 ( <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>)。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InnerObject%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> host control to access the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InnerObject%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>主机控件来访问基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: You then pass this object to a method or property that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 然后将该对象传递给方法或属性需要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的主机项和主机控件编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> to which the method is applied is contained in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 控件中是否包含应用该方法的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> specified is within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to which the method is applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用该方法的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 控件中包含指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> is contained in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control by comparing the starting and ending character positions, as well as the story type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>中包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>通过比较的起始和结束字符的位置，以及情景类型的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then checks to determine whether or not the bookmark is in the same range as Paragraph 1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到文档，然后检查以确定是否的书签将变为在相同的范围为 1 个段落的文本控件。

trans-unit.source: This code then displays the results in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 此代码随后将一个消息框中显示结果。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The text to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的文本。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified text at the end of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的末尾插入指定文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document, and then adds comments to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为到该文档中的文本，然后将注释添加到文本。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToPrevious%2A>, it displays the positions of the comments in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToPrevious%2A>，它在消息框中显示注释的位置。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAlignmentTabAlignment" /> values that specifies the type of alignment for the tab stop (such as left, center, or right).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAlignmentTabAlignment" /> 值之一，指定制表位的对齐类型（如左对齐、居中或右对齐）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAlignmentTabRelative" /> values that specifies whether the tab stop is relative to the margins or to the paragraph indents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAlignmentTabRelative" /> 值之一，指定制表位是相对于边距还是段落缩进。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an absolute tab in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> that is always positioned in the same spot, relative to either the margins or indents.
trans-unit.target: 将一个绝对制表符插入到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中，该绝对制表符相对于边距或缩进始终位于相同点上。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to match the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control with an existing AutoText entry name.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本与现有“自动图文集”词条名匹配。

trans-unit.source: If any such match is found, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertAutoText%2A> inserts the AutoText entry to replace that text.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到任何此类匹配，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertAutoText%2A>插入图文来替换该文本。

trans-unit.source: If a match cannot be found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到匹配项，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.AutoTextEntry.Insert%2A> method with an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.AutoTextEntry> object to insert a specific AutoText entry.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.AutoTextEntry.Insert%2A>方法替换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.AutoTextEntry>要插入特定图文条目对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的文本。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified text before the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之前插入指定文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document, and then adds comments to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为到该文档中的文本，然后将注释添加到文本。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToPrevious%2A>, this code displays the positions of the comments in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.GoToPrevious%2A>，此代码在消息框中将显示注释的位置。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The type of break to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的分隔符的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBreakType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBreakType" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a page, column, or section break into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中插入分页符、分列符或分节符。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then inserts a **Next page** section break before the fourth word in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到文档，然后插入的文本控件**下一页**第四个单词在书签中之前的部分中断。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The caption label to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的标题标签。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCaptionLabelID" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCaptionLabelID" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to be inserted immediately following the label in the caption (ignored if <c>TitleAutoText</c> is specified).
trans-unit.target: 要在紧靠该标题中的标签之后插入的文本（如果指定了 <c>TitleAutoText</c>，则忽略）。

trans-unit.source: The AutoText entry whose contents you want to insert immediately following the label in the caption (overrides any text specified by <c>Title</c>).
trans-unit.target: 要在紧靠该标题中的标签之后插入其内容的“自动图文集”词条（替代由 <c>Title</c> 指定的任何文本）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the caption is inserted above or below the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定是在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之上还是之下插入标题。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCaptionPosition" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCaptionPosition" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to not include the text label, as defined in the <c>Label</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示不包含文本标签，如 <c>Label</c> 参数中所定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to include the specified label.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则包含指定的标签。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a caption immediately preceding or following the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 紧靠 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之前或之后插入标题。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then inserts a caption into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>使用来控制文档，然后再插入的文本标题插入书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The type of item for which a cross-reference is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入交叉引用的项的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType" /> or <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCaptionLabelID" /> constant or a user defined caption label.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType" /> 或 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCaptionLabelID" /> 常数或一个用户定义的标题标签。

trans-unit.source: The information to be included in the cross-reference.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在交叉引用中的信息。

trans-unit.source: If <c>ReferenceType</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType.wdRefTypeBookmark" />, this argument specifies a bookmark name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>ReferenceType</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType.wdRefTypeBookmark" />，则此参数指定一个书签名。

trans-unit.source: For all other <c>ReferenceType</c> values, this argument specifies the item number or name in the **Reference type** box in the **Cross-reference** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他 <c>ReferenceType</c> 值，此参数指定位于“交叉引用”对话框的“引用类型”框中的项数或名称。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document.GetCrossReferenceItems(System.Object@)" /> method to return a list of item names that can be used with this argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document.GetCrossReferenceItems(System.Object@)" /> 方法可返回可与此参数一起使用的项名称列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert the cross-reference as a hyperlink to the referenced item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则将交叉引用作为超链接插入被引用项中；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert above or below, depending on the location of the reference item in relation to the cross-reference.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则根据引用项相对于交叉引用的位置，在之上或之下插入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use a separator to separate the numbers from the associated text.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则使用分隔符将编号与关联文本分隔开来。

trans-unit.source: (Use only if the <c>ReferenceType</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType.wdRefTypeNumberedItem" /> and the <c>ReferenceKind</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceKind.wdNumberFullContext" />.)
trans-unit.target: （仅当 <c>ReferenceType</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType.wdRefTypeNumberedItem" /> 且 <c>ReferenceKind</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceKind.wdNumberFullContext" /> 时使用。）

trans-unit.source: Specifies the string to use as a separator if the <c>SeparateNumbers</c> parameter is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>SeparateNumbers</c> 参数设置为 <see langword="true" />，则指定一个字符串来用作分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a cross-reference to a heading, bookmark, footnote, or endnote, or to an item for which a caption label is defined (for example, an equation, figure, or table) into a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将对标题、书签、脚注或尾注、或对定义有标题标签的项（例如，公式、图形或表）的交叉引用插入 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceKind.wdPageNumber> for the value of `ReferenceKind`, you might need to repaginate the document in order to see the correct cross-reference information.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceKind.wdPageNumber>的值的`ReferenceKind`，你可能需要重新文档分页才能看到正确的交叉引用信息。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a heading and text to the document using <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> controls and then inserts a cross-reference to the heading text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将标题和文本添加到文档使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制，然后插入对标题文本的交叉引用。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A format listed in the **Formats** box in the **Table AutoFormat** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在“表格自动套用格式”对话框中的“格式”框中列出的格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be any of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFormat" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTableFormat" /> 常数中的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: A border is applied to the cells in the table by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，会对表中的单元格应用边框。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the AutoFormat specified by <c>Format</c> that are applied to the table.
trans-unit.target: 由应用于表的 <c>Format</c> 指定的“自动套用格式”的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the sum of any combination of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下值的任意组合之和：

trans-unit.source: [1|1] Value
[1|2] Meaning
[2|2] None
[3|2] Borders
[4|2] Shading
[5|2] Font
[6|2] Color
[7|2] Auto Fit
trans-unit.target: [7|2] 自动调整

trans-unit.source: [8|2] Heading Rows
[9|2] Last Row
trans-unit.target: [9|2] 最后一行

trans-unit.source: [10|2] First Column
[11|2] Last Column
trans-unit.target: [11|2] 最后一列

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to establish a link between the new table and the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则创建新表与数据源之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: A range within which to perform the query specified by <c>SQLStatement</c>.
trans-unit.target: 限制执行由 <c>SQLStatement</c> 指定的查询的范围。

trans-unit.source: How you specify the range depends on how data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定范围的方式取决于数据的检索方式。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: When retrieving data through Open Database Connectivity (ODBC), you specify a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过开放式数据库连接 (ODBC) 检索，则指定一个连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: When retrieving data from Microsoft Office Excel by using dynamic data exchange (DDE), you specify a named range or "Entire Spreadsheet."
trans-unit.target: 如果通过使用动态数据交换 (DDE) 从 Microsoft Office Excel 检索，则指定一个指定范围或“整个电子表格”。

trans-unit.source: **Note** <see langword=" " />Dynamic data exchange (DDE) is an older technology that is not secure.
trans-unit.target: **注意**<see langword=" " />动态数据交换 (DDE) 是比较老的技术，它不是很安全。

trans-unit.source: If possible, use a more secure alternative to DDE, such as object linking and embedding (OLE).
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，请使用更安全的 DDE 的替代技术，如对象链接和嵌入 (OLE)。

trans-unit.source: When retrieving data from Microsoft Access, you specify the word "Table" or "Query" followed by the name of a table or query.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 Microsoft Access 检索数据，则指定单词“Table”或“Query”，其后跟表名或查询名称。

trans-unit.source: An optional query string that retrieves a subset of the data in a primary data source to be inserted into the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选查询字符串，它检索要插入文档中的、主数据源中的数据的子集。

trans-unit.source: If the query string is longer than 255 characters, <c>SQLStatement</c> denotes the first portion of the string and <c>SQLStatement1</c> denotes the second portion.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询字符串的长度超过 255 个字符，则 <c>SQLStatement</c> 表示该字符串的第一部分，而 <c>SQLStatement1</c> 表示第二部分。

trans-unit.source: The password (if any) required to open the data source.
trans-unit.target: 打开数据源所需的密码（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a Microsoft Office Word document, this argument is the password (if any) required to open the attached template.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源为 Microsoft Office Word 文档，则此参数为打开附加模板所需的密码（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: The password required to save changes to the document.
trans-unit.target: 保存对文档的更改所需的密码。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: The password required to save changes to the template.
trans-unit.target: 保存对模板的更改所需的密码。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first data record in the range of records to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的记录的范围中第一个数据记录的编号。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last data record in the range of records to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的记录的范围中最后一个数据记录的编号。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include field names from the data source in the first row of the new table.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则在新表的第一行中包含来自数据源的字段名。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from a data source (for example, a separate Microsoft Office Word document, a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet, or a Microsoft Access database) and inserts the data as a table in place of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源（例如，一个单独的 Microsoft Office Word 文档、一个 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表或一个 Microsoft Access 数据库）检索数据，并以表的形式插入该数据来代替 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using the built-in system administrator (sa) logon account.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用内置的系统管理员 (sa) 登录帐户。

trans-unit.source: Instead, make system administrators members of the sysadmin fixed server role, and have them use their own accounts to log on.
trans-unit.target: 相反，使系统管理员成员的 sysadmin 固定的服务器角色，并将它们使用其自己的帐户登录。

trans-unit.source: Use sa only when there is no other way to log on.
trans-unit.target: 仅当没有其他方法登录，请使用 sa。

trans-unit.source: To prevent unauthorized access through the sa logon account, you should assign that account a strong, unique password.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止未经授权的访问通过 sa 登录帐户，应该为该帐户分配唯一的强密码。

trans-unit.source: When possible, use Windows Authentication (also referred to as a trusted connection), which uses a Windows user account to connect to SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，请使用 Windows 身份验证 （也称为可信连接） 的 Windows 用户帐户用于连接到 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: When a user connects through a Windows user account, SQL Server uses information in the Windows operating system to validate the account name and password.
trans-unit.target: 当用户连接通过 Windows 用户帐户时，SQL Server 使用信息在 Windows 操作系统中来验证帐户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: Before you can use Windows Authentication, a server administrator must configure SQL Server to use this mode of authentication.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 Windows 身份验证之前，服务器管理员必须配置 SQL Server 以使用这种模式的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Authentication is not available, avoid saving users' logon information.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 身份验证不可用，避免保存用户的登录信息。

trans-unit.source: It is more secure for users to enter their logon information each time they log on.
trans-unit.target: 它是更安全的用户输入他们的登录信息每次登录的时。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: This example inserts a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet into the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将插入到 Microsoft Excel 电子表格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Style value (191) is a combination of the numbers 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, and 128.
This example assumes you have a workbook named `Data.xlsx` saved to the root of the C directory with at least two rows of data on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定您具有名为工作簿`Data.xlsx`工作表上保存到使用的数据的至少两个行 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The format to be used for displaying the date or time, or both.
trans-unit.target: 要用于显示日期或时间，或同时显示日期和时间的格式。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Word uses the short-date style from the Windows Control Panel (**Regional Settings** icon).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 使用来自 Windows 控制面板（“区域设置”图标）的短日期样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert the specified information as a TIME field; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则以 TIME 字段的形式插入指定信息；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert the specified information as double-byte digits; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则以双字节数字的形式插入指定信息；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the language in which to display the date or time.
trans-unit.target: 设置显示日期和时间的语言。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDateLanguage" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDateLanguage.wdDateLanguageBidi" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDateLanguage.wdDateLanguageLatin" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDateLanguage" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDateLanguage.wdDateLanguageBidi" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDateLanguage.wdDateLanguageLatin" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the calendar type to use when displaying the date or time.
trans-unit.target: 设置显示日期或时间时要使用的日历类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCalendarTypeBi" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCalendarTypeBi.wdCalendarTypeBidi" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCalendarTypeBi.wdCalendarTypeGregorian" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCalendarTypeBi" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCalendarTypeBi.wdCalendarTypeBidi" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCalendarTypeBi.wdCalendarTypeGregorian" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the current date or time, or both, either as text or as a TIME field in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 以文本或以 TIME 字段的形式将当前日期或时间，或同时将日期和时间插入 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inserts a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text in the document and then inserts the date and time field into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中插入<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件替换为文本，然后插入和文档中的日期和时间字段到书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the file to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a path, Microsoft Office Word assumes the file is in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定路径，则 Microsoft Office Word 假定该文件在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file is a Word document, this parameter refers to a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的文件是一个 Word 文档，则此参数表示一个书签。

trans-unit.source: If the file is another type (for example, a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet), this parameter refers to a named range or a cell range (for example, R1C1:R3C4).
trans-unit.target: 如果该文件是另一种类型（例如，一个 Microsoft Office Excel 工作簿），则此参数表示指定范围或单元格范围（例如，R1C1:R3C4）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Word prompt you to confirm conversion when inserting files in formats other than the Word Document format.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则插入非 Word 文档格式的文件时，让 Word 提示确认转换。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert the file by using a <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFieldType.wdFieldIncludeText" /> field.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则通过使用 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFieldType.wdFieldIncludeText" /> 字段插入文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert the file as an attachment to an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则以附件的形式将该文件插入电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts all or part of the specified file into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将所有或部分指定文件插入 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a Bookmark control to the document and then inserts a file into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向文档添加书签控件，然后将一个文件插入到书签。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a document named `Sales.docx` at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有名为的文档`Sales.docx`在 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control with a new paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 用新段落替换 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to replace the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Collapse%2A> method before using this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想要替换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Collapse%2A>方法，然后才能使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertParagraphAfter%2A> method inserts a new paragraph following a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertParagraphAfter%2A>方法插入段落后的新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a paragraph mark after a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之后插入一个段落标记。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new paragraph before the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之前插入一个新段落。

trans-unit.source: After this method is applied, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control expands to include the new paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 应用此方法后，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件扩展以包含新段落。

trans-unit.source: The character number for the specified symbol.
trans-unit.target: 指定符号的字符数。

trans-unit.source: This value is always the sum of 31 and the number that corresponds to the position of the symbol in the table of symbols (counting from left to right).
trans-unit.target: 此值始终为 31 与对应于该符号在符号表中的位置的数字（从左向右数）之和。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify a delta character at position 37 in the table of symbols in the Symbol font, set <c>CharacterNumber</c> to 68.
trans-unit.target: 例如，要指定在 Symbol 字体中位于符号表中位置 37 处的增量字符，请将 <c>CharacterNumber</c> 设置为 68。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font that contains the symbol.
trans-unit.target: 包含符号的字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to insert the Unicode character specified by <c>CharacterNumber</c>; <see langword="false" /> to insert the ANSI character specified by <c>CharacterNumber</c>.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则插入由 <c>CharacterNumber</c> 指定的 Unicode 字符；为 <see langword="false" />，则插入由 <c>CharacterNumber</c> 指定的 ANSI 字符。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font bias for symbols.
trans-unit.target: 设置符号的字体偏量。

trans-unit.source: This argument is useful for setting the correct font bias for East Asian characters.
trans-unit.target: 此参数在设置东亚字符的正确字体偏量时很有用。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias.wdFontBiasDefault" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias.wdFontBiasDontCare" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias.wdFontBiasFareast" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias.wdFontBiasDefault" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias.wdFontBiasDontCare" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFontBias.wdFontBiasFareast" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a symbol in place of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 插入一个符号来代替 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then inserts a double-headed arrow into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到文档，然后插入双向双箭头插入该书签。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark is deleted from the document when you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertSymbol%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用时从文档中删除该书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertSymbol%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The XML text to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 XML 文本。

trans-unit.source: The transform to apply to the inserted XML text.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于插入的 XML 文本的转换。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified XML text into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件插入指定的 XML 文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control contains text, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertXML%2A> method replaces the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包含文本，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertXML%2A>方法替换现有文本。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertXML%2A> method to insert text marked up with either arbitrary XML or Word XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertXML%2A>方法将文本插入任意 XML 或 Word XML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The XML must be well formed.
trans-unit.target: 此 XML 必须格式正确。

trans-unit.source: If it uses Word XML, then it must also be valid according to the Word XML schema.
trans-unit.target: 如果它使用 Word XML，然后它还必须是符合 Word XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: If the specified XML text cannot be inserted into the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control, an error message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 XML 文本不能插入<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>显示控件，一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then inserts XML text into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到文档，然后将 XML 文本插入书签。

trans-unit.source: A message box is then displayed to show the total number of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes> and the XML content of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 然后显示一个消息框以显示总数目<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes>和书签的 XML 内容。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object whose story is compared with the story that contains the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，其文章与包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的文章进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to which this method is applied is in the same story as the range specified by the <paramref name="Range" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 确定应用此方法的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件与 <paramref name="Range" /> 参数指定的范围是否位于同一文章中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to which this method is applied is in the same story as the range specified by the <paramref name="Range" /> argument; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用此方法的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件与 <paramref name="Range" /> 参数指定的范围位于同一文章中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then checks to find out whether or not it is in the same story as the first paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到文档，然后检查以找出是否它为作为第一个段落的同一篇文章中的文本控件。

trans-unit.source: The results are then displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 结果将显示消息框中。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is collapsed and is located at the end-of-row mark in a table.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件是否已折叠且位于表中的行末标记处。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is collapsed and is located at the end-of-row mark in a table; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件已折叠且位于表中的行末标记处，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that is compared with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 控件进行比较的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to which this method is applied is equal to the range specified by the <paramref name="Range" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 确定应用此方法的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件是否与 <paramref name="Range" /> 参数指定的范围相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to which this method is applied is equal to the range specified by the <paramref name="Range" /> argument; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用此方法的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件与 <paramref name="Range" /> 参数指定的范围相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method compares the starting and ending character positions, as well as the story type.
trans-unit.target: 起始和结束字符的位置，以及情景类型，此方法将进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If all three of these items are the same for both objects, the objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些项中的所有三个对于两个对象相同，则对象相等。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and checks to find out whether or not the range of the bookmark is equal to the range of the first paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有文档，然后检查以查明书签的范围是否相等的范围的第一个段落的文本控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is formatted as italic.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的格式是否设置为斜体。

trans-unit.source: 0 if none of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is italic; -1 if all of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is italic; <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> (999999) if part of the text in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is italic.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的任何文本都不是斜体，则为 0；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有文本都是斜体，则为 -1；如果 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> 控件中的部分文本是斜体，则为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> (999999)。

trans-unit.source: The values this property can be set to are 0, -1, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为的值是 0，-1，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then applies formatting to the bookmark based on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> of the text within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制对该文档，然后将应用格式设置为基于书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>在书签内的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is formatted as italic.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的格式是否设置为斜体。

trans-unit.source: 0 if none of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control text is italic; 1 if all of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is italic; <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> (999999) if part of the text in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is italic.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件文本中的任何文本都不是斜体，则为 0；如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有文本都是斜体，则为 1；如果 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> 控件中的部分文本是斜体，则为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> (999999)。

trans-unit.source: The values this property can be set to are 0, 1, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为值为 0、 1、 或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdToggle>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ItalicBi%2A> property applies to text in right-to-left languages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ItalicBi%2A>属性适用于从右到左语言的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then applies formatting to the bookmark based on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> of the text within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制对该文档，然后将应用格式设置为基于书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>在书签内的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the specified range of Japanese language text in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is hiragana or katakana.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中指定范围的日语文本是平假名还是片假名。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdKana" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdKana" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined> if the range of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control contains a mix of hiragana and katakana or if the range contains some non-Japanese text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined>如果的范围<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包含平假名和片假名或包含一些非日语文本范围的组合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Kana%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined>, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Kana%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined>，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and displays a message if the text contains hiragana characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个段落，并显示一条消息，如果文本包含平假名字符。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word has detected the language of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否已检测到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的语言。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word has detected the language of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 已检测到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的语言，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> property for the results of any previous language detection.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>的结果的任何以前的语言检测的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.DetectLanguage%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A>属性设置为`true`时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.DetectLanguage%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To reevaluate the language of the text, you must first set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新计算的文本的语言，必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageDetected%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the language for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的语言。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: For a custom dictionary, you must first set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary.LanguageSpecific%2A> property to `true` before specifying the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义词典，你必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary.LanguageSpecific%2A>属性`true`之前指定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Custom dictionaries that are language specific only look at text formatted for that language.
trans-unit.target: 特定于语言的自定义词典仅查看针对该语言的格式的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then applies formatting to the bookmark based on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A> of the text within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制对该文档，然后将应用格式设置为基于书签<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageID%2A>在书签内的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an East Asian language for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的东亚语言。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This is the recommended way to return or set the language of East Asian text in a document created in an East Asian version of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 这是建议的方法要返回或设置在东亚语言版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中创建的文档中的东亚文本的语言。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageIDFarEast%2A> property to Korean.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到的第一个段落和集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageIDFarEast%2A>为朝鲜语的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the language for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的语言。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This is the recommended way to return or set the language of Latin text in a document created in a right-to-left language version of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 这是建议的方法可以返回或设置拉丁文本的语言从右向左的语言版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中创建的文档中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageIDOther%2A> property to French.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到的第一个段落和集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.LanguageIDOther%2A>为法语的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListFormat" /> object that represents all the list formatting characteristics of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListFormat" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的所有列表格式设置特征。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListFormat" /> object that represents all the list formatting characteristics of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListFormat" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的所有列表格式设置特征。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and applies the default bulleted-list format to the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制转移到第一个段落，并将默认项目符号列表格式应用到的书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListParagraphs" /> collection that represents all the numbered paragraphs in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListParagraphs" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有编号段落。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListParagraphs" /> collection that represents all the numbered paragraphs in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ListParagraphs" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有编号段落。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and applies the default bulleted-list format to the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制转移到第一个段落，并将默认项目符号列表格式应用到的书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style that is used to format a bulleted list or numbered list in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的项目符号列表或编号列表的格式的样式。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style that is used to format a bulleted list or numbered list in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的项目符号列表或编号列表的格式的样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the co-authoring locks in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的共同创作锁。

trans-unit.source: The co-authoring locks in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的共同创作锁。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in co-authoring enabled documents.
trans-unit.target: 可以仅在共同创作启用的文档中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to access this property on a document that is not enabled for co-authoring, you will receive a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试访问此属性的文档中未启用共同创作，你将收到<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Co-authoring is not enabled in the document that contains the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 包含书签的文档中未启用共同创作。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Looks up a name in the global address book list and displays the **Properties** dialog box, which includes information about the specified name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在全局通讯簿列表中查找一个姓名并显示“属性”对话框，其中包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的指定姓名的有关信息。

trans-unit.source: If this method finds more than one match, it displays the **Check Names** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找到多个匹配项，则显示**检查名称**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The style of the enclosure.
trans-unit.target: 包围符号的样式。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEncloseStyle" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEncloseStyle" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: The symbol in which to enclose the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 包围 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的符号。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEnclosureType" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEnclosureType" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: The characters that you want to enclose.
trans-unit.target: 要包围的字符。

trans-unit.source: If you include this argument, Microsoft Office Word replaces the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control with the enclosed characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含此参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 用包围的字符替换 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify text to enclose, Microsoft Office Word encloses all text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定要包围的文本，则 Microsoft Office Word 包围 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds, modifies, or removes an enclosure around the specified character or characters in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中添加、修改或移除指定字符周围的包围符号。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph and encloses the third character in a circle.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制转移到第一个段落，操作数包含在一个圆周中的第三个字符。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The unit by which to move the ending character position.
trans-unit.target: 移动结束字符位置所依据的单位。

trans-unit.source: The number of units to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的单元的数量。

trans-unit.source: If this number is positive, the ending character position is moved forward in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数字为正数，则结束字符位置将在文档中向前移动。

trans-unit.source: If this number is negative, the end is moved backward.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数字为负数，则结束字符位置将向后移动。

trans-unit.source: If the ending position overtakes the starting position, the range collapses and both character positions move together.
trans-unit.target: 如果结束位置超过起始位置，则范围将折叠，并且两个字符位置将一起移动。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Moves the ending character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 移动 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of units the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control actually moved, or it returns 0 (zero) if the move was unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件实际被移动的单位数，或者，如果移动不成功，则该控件返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and displays the last word of the bookmark in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到第一个段落的文本控件，并显示消息框中的书签的最后一个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.MoveEnd%2A> method and displays the last word of the bookmark in a new message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，代码调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.MoveEnd%2A>方法并在新的消息框中显示书签的最后一个单词。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One or more characters.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: This argument is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此参数区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters by which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件移动的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: Can be a number or either the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdBackward" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个数字，也可以是 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdBackward" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Count</c> is a positive number, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved forward in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Count</c> 是正数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件将在文档中向前移动。

trans-unit.source: If it is a negative number, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved backward.
trans-unit.target: 如果是负数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件将向后移动。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the end position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control until any of the specified characters are found in the document.
trans-unit.target: 移动 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束位置，直到在文档中找到任意指定字符。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters by which the end position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control was moved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束位置被移动的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="Count" /> is greater than 0 (zero), this method returns the number of characters moved plus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="Count" /> 大于 0（零），则此方法返回被移动的字符数加 1。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="Count" /> is less than 0 (zero), this method returns the number of characters moved minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="Count" /> 小于 0（零），则此方法返回被移动的字符数减 1。

trans-unit.source: If no <paramref name="Cset" /> characters are found, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is not changed and the method returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到 <paramref name="Cset" /> 字符，则不会更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件，并且该方法返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: If the movement is forward in the document, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果是向前移动在文档中，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件已展开。

trans-unit.source: If the end position is moved backward to a point that precedes the original start position, the start position is set to the new ending position.
trans-unit.target: 如果结束位置向后移动到原始开始位置之前的点，起始位置设置为新的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then adds another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the third word in the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到第一个段落的文本，然后添加另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then moves the range of the second bookmark until it finds the character k.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码移动第二个的书签的范围，直至找到字符 k。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One or more characters.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: This argument is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此参数区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters by which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件移动的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: Can be a number or either the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdBackward" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个数字，也可以是 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdBackward" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Count</c> is a positive number, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved forward in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Count</c> 是正数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件将在文档中向前移动。

trans-unit.source: If it is a negative number, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved backward.
trans-unit.target: 如果是负数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件将向后移动。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the ending character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control while any of the specified characters are found in the document.
trans-unit.target: 只要在文档中找到任意指定字符，就移动 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that the end position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control moved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束位置被移动的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If no <paramref name="Cset" /> characters are found, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is not changed and the method returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到 <paramref name="Cset" /> 字符，则不会更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件，并且该方法返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: While any character in `Cset` is found, the end position of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is moved.
trans-unit.target: 中的任意字符`Cset`找到的结束位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>移动控件。

trans-unit.source: If the end position is moved backward to a point that precedes the original start position, the start position is set to the new end position.
trans-unit.target: 如果结束位置向后移动到原始开始位置之前的点，起始位置设置为新的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then adds another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the third word in the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到第一个段落的文本，然后添加另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then moves the range of the second bookmark while it can find the characters b, o, o, k, m, a, r, or k.
trans-unit.target: 该代码时它可以查找字符 b、 o、 o、 k、 m，然后移动第二个的书签的范围，r 或 k。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnits" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnits" />。

trans-unit.source: The unit by which start position of the specified range or selection is to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要移动指定范围或所选内容的起始位置所依据的单位。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of units by which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件移动的最大单位数。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Count</c> is a positive number, the start position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved forward in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Count</c> 是正数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始位置将在文档中向前移动。

trans-unit.source: If it is a negative number, the start position is moved backward.
trans-unit.target: 如果是负数，起始位置将向后移动。

trans-unit.source: If the start position is moved forward to a position beyond the end position, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is collapsed and both the start and end positions are moved together.
trans-unit.target: 如果将起始位置向前移动到超出结束位置的某个位置，将折叠 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件，并将一起移动起始位置和结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Moves the start position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 移动 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of units by which the start position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control actually moved, or it returns 0 (zero) if the move was unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始位置实际被移动的单位数，或者，如果移动不成功，则该控件返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.target: 如果未找到 <paramref name="Cset" /> 字符，则不会更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件，并且该方法返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> is collapsed to a zero-length bookmark.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>折叠为零长度书签。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then adds another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the third word in the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到第一个段落的文本，然后添加另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then moves the range of the second bookmark while it can find a blank space.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码将移动第二个的书签的范围时它可以找到的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One or more characters.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: This argument is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此参数区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters by which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件移动的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: Can be a number or either the <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdBackward" /> constant.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个数字，也可以是 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdBackward" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Count</c> is a positive number, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved forward in the document, beginning at the end position.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Count</c> 是正数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件将在文档中从结束位置开始向前移动。

trans-unit.source: If it is a negative number, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is moved backward, beginning at the start position.
trans-unit.target: 如果是负数，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件将从起始位置开始向后移动。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdForward" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control while any of the specified characters are found in the document.
trans-unit.target: 只要在文档中找到任意指定字符，就移动 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters by which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control was moved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件被移动的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If no <paramref name="Cset" /> characters are found, the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is not changed and the method returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到 <paramref name="Cset" /> 字符，则不会更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件，并且该方法返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: While any character in `Cset` is found, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is moved.
trans-unit.target: 中的任意字符`Cset`找到，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>移动控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> is collapsed to a zero-length bookmark.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>折叠为零长度书签。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then adds another <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the third word in the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到第一个段落的文本，然后添加另一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then collapses and moves the second bookmark while it can find the characters b, o, o, or k.
trans-unit.target: 然后，代码会将折叠，并移动第二个的书签，而它可以查找字符 b、 o、 o 或 k。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents the specified unit relative to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
