trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a **Next page** section break to the document and then adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the even page header of section 1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加**下一页**部分中断添加到文档，然后添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有部分 1 的偶数页标题的文本控件。

trans-unit.source: The code then uses <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.NextStoryRange%2A> to add text to the header of section 2.
trans-unit.target: 该代码将使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.NextStoryRange%2A>将文本添加到第 2 节的标头。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value that indicates whether the spelling and grammar checker ignores the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示拼写和语法检查器是否忽略 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本。

trans-unit.source: 0 if the spelling and grammar checker does not ignore the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control; 1 if the spelling and grammar checker ignores the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control; <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> if the spelling and grammar checker ignores only some of the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果拼写和语法检查器不忽略 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本，则为 0；如果拼写和语法检查器忽略 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本，则为 1；如果拼写和语法检查器仅忽略 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdUndefined" /> 控件中的某些文本，则为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with misspelled text to the first paragraph, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.NoProofing%2A> property of the bookmark to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有拼写错误文本的第一个段落和集到控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.NoProofing%2A>到书签属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the document is checked for spelling errors, the misspelled text within the bookmark is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当检查文档存在拼写错误时，将忽略该书签中拼写错误的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example pastes a Microsoft Excel chart into the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例粘贴到 Microsoft Excel 图表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the Clipboard contains an Excel chart.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要剪贴板包含 Excel 图表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Merges pasted cells into an existing table in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control by inserting the pasted rows between the selected rows.
trans-unit.target: 通过将粘贴的行插入选择的行之间来将粘贴的单元格合并到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的现有表中。

trans-unit.source: No cells are overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 没有单元格将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Pastes a cell or group of cells as a nested table into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或一组单元格作为嵌套表粘贴到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.PasteAsNestedTable%2A> only if the Clipboard contains a cell or group of cells and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control contains a cell or group of cells in the current document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.PasteAsNestedTable%2A>剪贴板包含的单元格或组的单元格时才与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包含的单元格或组的当前文档中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the table in the document, then pastes the table to the third cell as a nested table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件到文档中的表，然后将该表粘贴到第三个单元格为嵌套表。

trans-unit.source: The code then selects the next table in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码在书签中选择下一个表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to link the pasted table to the original Excel file so that changes made to the Excel file are reflected in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则将粘贴的表链接到原始 Excel 文件，以便在 Microsoft Office Word 中反映对 Excel 文件所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to format the table using the formatting in the Word document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则使用 Word 文档中的格式设置来设置表的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to format the table according to the original Excel file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则根据原始 Excel 文件设置表的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to paste the Excel table using Rich Text Format (RTF).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则以 RTF 格式粘贴 Excel 表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to paste the Excel table as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则以 HTML 格式粘贴 Excel 表。

trans-unit.source: Pastes and formats a Microsoft Office Excel table into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将一个 Microsoft Office Excel 表粘贴到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中，并对其进行格式设置。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: The following code example pastes an Excel table into the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例粘贴到的 Excel 表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The parameters specify that the pasted table is linked to the Excel file, retains the original Excel formatting, and is pasted as RTF.
trans-unit.target: 参数指定粘贴的表链接到 Excel 文件，将保留原始 Excel 格式、 上，并粘贴为 rtf 格式。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the Clipboard contains an Excel table.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要剪贴板包含的 Excel 表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: If <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> is <see langword="true" />, this argument is a number that corresponds to the icon you want to use in the program file specified by <c>IconFilename</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数为一个数字，该数字对应于你希望在程序文件中使用的由 <c>IconFilename</c> 指定的图标。

trans-unit.source: Icons appear in the **Change Icon** dialog box: 0 (zero) corresponds to the first icon, 1 corresponds to the second icon, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 图标显示在“更改图标”对话框中：0（零）对应于第一个图标，1 对应于第二个图标，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the first (default) icon is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用第一个（默认）图标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a link to the source file of the Clipboard contents.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则创建一个到剪贴板内容的源文件的链接。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement.wdFloatOverText" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement.wdInLine" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement.wdFloatOverText" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement.wdInLine" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement.wdInLine" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOLEPlacement.wdInLine" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the link as an icon.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则以图标形式显示链接。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A format for the Clipboard contents when they are inserted into the document.
trans-unit.target: 在将剪贴板内容插入文档时，剪贴板内容的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPasteDataType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPasteDataType" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> is <see langword="true" />, this argument is the path and file name for the file in which the icon to be displayed is stored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数为在其中存储要显示的图标的文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: If <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> is <see langword="true" />, this argument is the text that appears below the icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>DisplayAsIcon</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数为显示在图标下面的文本。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the contents of the Clipboard into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将剪贴板的内容插入 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Paste%2A> method, with <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.PasteSpecial%2A> you can control the format of the pasted information and (optionally) establish a link to the source file (for example, a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet).
trans-unit.target: 与不同与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Paste%2A>方法，与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.PasteSpecial%2A>可以控制所粘贴信息的格式并 （可选） 建立到源代码文件 （例如，为 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表） 的链接。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method might delete the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可能会删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inserts the Clipboard contents in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control as unformatted text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将中的剪贴板内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>为无格式文本控件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the Clipboard contains some text.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定剪贴板包含一些文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The phonetic text to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的拼音文本。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPhoneticGuideAlignmentType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPhoneticGuideAlignmentType" />。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the added phonetic text.
trans-unit.target: 添加的拼音文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The distance (in points) from the top of the text in the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the top of the phonetic text.
trans-unit.target: 从指定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的顶部到拼音文本的顶部的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified, Microsoft Office Word automatically sets the phonetic text at an optimum distance above the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定任何值，则 Microsoft Office Word 将拼音文本自动设置为位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件之上的最佳距离上。

trans-unit.source: The font size to use for the phonetic text.
trans-unit.target: 要用于拼音文本的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified, Word uses a font size 50 percent smaller than the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定任何值，则 Word 使用比 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本小 50% 的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font to use for the phonetic text.
trans-unit.target: 要用于拼音文本的字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified, Word uses the same font as the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定任何值，则 Word 使用与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本相同的字体。

trans-unit.source: Adds phonetic guides to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将拼音指南添加到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last bookmark that starts before or at the same place as the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件相同的位置或之前的位置开始的最后一个书签的编号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.PreviousBookmarkID%2A> property returns 0 (zero) if there is no corresponding bookmark.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> object that represents the portion of a document that is contained in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> 对象，表示包含在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文档部分。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then sets the text in the bookmark to bold.

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的可读性统计信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> collection that represents the readability statistics for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ReadabilityStatistics%2A> property of the bookmark to display the number of words the bookmark contains in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有为第一个段落，然后使用的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ReadabilityStatistics%2A>显示单词数的书签的属性在消息框中包含的书签。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRelocate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRelocate" />。

trans-unit.source: The direction of the move.
trans-unit.target: 移动的方向。

trans-unit.source: In outline view, moves the paragraphs within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control after the next visible paragraph or before the previous visible paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 在大纲视图中，将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的段落移动到下一个可见段落之后或上一个可见段落之前。

trans-unit.source: Body text moves with a heading only if the body text is collapsed in outline view or if it is part of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在大纲视图中折叠的正文文本或如果它是的一部分，则正文包含标题将移动<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a three-column, three-row table to the document, adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the table, then changes the height of the first row within the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向文档添加一个三列三行的表，添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件到表中，然后将更改在书签内第一个行的高度。

trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.target: 使用此方法后，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Selection%2A>属性才能正常使用所选<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then selects the first sentence in the bookmark.

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A number that indicates the new list level.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示新列表级别的数字。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list level for one or more items in a numbered list in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的编号列表中的一个或多个项的列表级别。

trans-unit.source: The starting character position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The ending character position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the starting and ending character positions for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始字符位置和结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: Character position values start at the beginning of the story, with the first value being 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 字符位置值从该情景，开头起始值为 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: All characters are counted, including nonprinting characters.
trans-unit.target: 计算所有字符，包括非打印字符。

trans-unit.source: Hidden characters are counted even if they are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的字符也计算在内，即使它们不会显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SetRange%2A> method redefines the starting and ending positions of an existing <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SetRange%2A>方法重新定义的起始和结束位置的现有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then sets the range of the bookmark to the first character in the document.

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shading" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的底纹格式设置。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到文档，然后设置的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shading.BackgroundPatternColor%2A>为浅绿色的书签。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ShapeRange" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> 控件中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ShapeRange" /> collection that represents all the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ShapeRange" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> 控件中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The shape range can contain drawings, shapes, pictures, OLE objects, ActiveX controls, text objects, and callouts.
trans-unit.target: 形状范围只能包含绘图、 形状、 图片，OLE 对象、 ActiveX 控件、 文本对象和标注。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>与文本的文档，然后使用垂直和水平位置的书签在创建时控制文本框。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all nonprinting characters (such as hidden text, tab marks, space marks, and paragraph marks) within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有非打印字符（如隐藏文本、制表符标记、空格标记和段落标记）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> of nonprinting characters within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的非打印字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to exclude the first row or paragraph header from the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要从排序操作中排除第一行或段落标头，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The fields to sort by.
trans-unit.target: 要作为排序依据的字段。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Word sorts by <c>FieldNumber</c>, then by <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and then by <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 的排序方式为 <c>FieldNumber</c>，然后为 <c>FieldNumber2</c>，最后为 <c>FieldNumber3</c>。

trans-unit.source: The respective sort types for <c>FieldNumber</c>, <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>FieldNumber</c>、<c>FieldNumber2</c> 和 <c>FieldNumber3</c> 各自的排序类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortFieldType" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortFieldType" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: The sorting order to use when sorting <c>FieldNumber</c>, <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: 对 <c>FieldNumber</c>、<c>FieldNumber2</c> 和 <c>FieldNumber3</c> 进行排序时使用的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortOrder" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortOrder" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: The fields to sort by.
trans-unit.target: 要作为排序依据的字段。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Word sorts by <c>FieldNumber</c>, then by <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and then by <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 的排序方式为 <c>FieldNumber</c>，然后为 <c>FieldNumber2</c>，最后为 <c>FieldNumber3</c>。

trans-unit.source: The respective sort types for <c>FieldNumber</c>, <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>FieldNumber</c>、<c>FieldNumber2</c> 和 <c>FieldNumber3</c> 各自的排序类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortFieldType" /> constants
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortFieldType" /> 常量之一

trans-unit.source: The sorting order to use when sorting <c>FieldNumber</c>, <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: 对 <c>FieldNumber</c>、<c>FieldNumber2</c> 和 <c>FieldNumber3</c> 进行排序时使用的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortOrder" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortOrder" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: The fields to sort by.
trans-unit.target: 要作为排序依据的字段。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Word sorts by <c>FieldNumber</c>, then by <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and then by <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 的排序方式为 <c>FieldNumber</c>，然后为 <c>FieldNumber2</c>，最后为 <c>FieldNumber3</c>。

trans-unit.source: The respective sort types for <c>FieldNumber</c>, <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>FieldNumber</c>、<c>FieldNumber2</c> 和 <c>FieldNumber3</c> 各自的排序类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortFieldType" /> constants
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortFieldType" /> 常量之一

trans-unit.source: The sorting order to use when sorting <c>FieldNumber</c>, <c>FieldNumber2</c>, and <c>FieldNumber3</c>.
trans-unit.target: 对 <c>FieldNumber</c>、<c>FieldNumber2</c> 和 <c>FieldNumber3</c> 进行排序时使用的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortOrder" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortOrder" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to sort only the column specified by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="true" /> 对仅由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件指定的列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of field separator.
trans-unit.target: 字段分隔符的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortSeparator" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSortSeparator" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to sort with case sensitivity.
trans-unit.target: 排序时若要区分大小写，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to sort based on right-to-left language rules.
trans-unit.target: 若要根据从右到左的语言规则进行排序，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore the Arabic characters <c>alef</c><c>lam</c> when sorting right-to-left language text.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则在对从右向左的语言文本进行排序时忽略阿拉伯字符 <c>alef</c><c>lam</c>。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore kashidas when sorting right-to-left language text.
trans-unit.target: 如果对从右到左的语言的文本进行排序时，需要忽略 kashidas，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore bidirectional control characters when sorting right-to-left language text.
trans-unit.target: 如果对从右到左的语言的文本进行排序时，需要忽略双向控制字符，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore the Hebrew character <c>he</c> when sorting right-to-left language text.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则在对从右向左的语言文本进行排序时忽略希伯来字符 <c>he</c>。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the sorting language.
trans-unit.target: 指定排序语言。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> constants.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID" /> 常量之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with a list of fruits and then sorts the list in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制水果，然后排序的列表中升序排序的列表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Sorts paragraphs or table rows in ascending alphanumeric order within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 按照字母数字升序顺序对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的段落或表行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The first paragraph or table row is considered a header record and is not included in the sort.
trans-unit.target: 第一个段落或表格行被视为标头记录和未包含在排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A> method to include the header record in a sort.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A>方法将标头记录包含在排序中。

trans-unit.source: This method offers a simplified form of sorting intended for mail merge data sources that contain columns of data.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供了针对邮件合并数据源包含的数据列进行排序一种简化的的形式。

trans-unit.source: For most sorting tasks, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数排序任务，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method displays a **Header Record Delimiters** dialog box where users must select a field delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会显示**标头记录分隔符**对话框中，用户必须从中选择字段分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a list of fruits to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control and then sorts the list in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加一个到水果列表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制然后列表进行排序以升序。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The first paragraph or table row is considered a header record and is not included in the sort.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A> method to include the header record in a sort.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A>方法将标头记录包含在排序中。

trans-unit.source: This method offers a simplified form of sorting intended for mail-merge data sources that contain columns of data.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供了针对邮件合并数据源包含的数据列进行排序一种简化的的形式。

trans-unit.source: For most sorting tasks, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数排序任务，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.Sort%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 此方法会显示**标头记录分隔符**对话框中，用户必须从中选择字段分隔符。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether spelling has been checked throughout the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已对整个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件进行了拼写检查。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if spelling has been checked throughout the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已对整个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件进行了拼写检查，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To recheck the spelling in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SpellingChecked%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 以重新检查在拼写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制、 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SpellingChecked%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To check whether or not the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control contains spelling errors, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SpellingErrors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包含拼写错误，则使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SpellingErrors%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the words identified as spelling errors in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中标识为拼写错误的单词。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the words identified as spelling errors in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中标识为拼写错误的单词。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then runs the spell checker if there are spelling errors in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>带到第一个段落，然后运行文本控制拼写检查器，如果在书签中存在拼写错误。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The starting character position of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control has a starting position and an ending position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件具有的起始位置和结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The ending position is the point farthest away from the beginning of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 结束的位置是远的开始点<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the size of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来更改的大小<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value larger than that of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A> property, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A> property is set to the same value as that of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为一个值大于该值的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A>属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.End%2A>属性设置为相同的值的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph and then adds a second <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the third word in the first bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到第一个段落的文本，然后添加第二个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到第一个书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: The code then moves the range of the first bookmark until it finds a space and redefines the bookmark size by changing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 该代码然后移动第一个书签的范围，直到它找到空格，并将该书签的大小重新定义通过更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Start%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnits" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnits" />。

trans-unit.source: The unit by which the start position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control is to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要移动 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始位置所依据的单位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMovementType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdMovementType" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves or extends the start position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the beginning of the nearest specified text unit.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的起始位置移动或扩展到最近的指定文本单元的开头。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters by which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control was moved or extended.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件被移动或扩展的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The method returns a negative number if the movement is backward through the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果在文档中向后移动，则该方法返回一个负数。

trans-unit.source: If the beginning of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is already at the beginning of the specified unit, this method does not move or extend the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果开始<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件是否已指定的单位开头，则此方法不移动或扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的样式。

trans-unit.source: The style for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的样式。

trans-unit.source: To set this property, specify the local name of the style, an integer, a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuiltinStyle> constant, or an object that represents the style.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此属性，指定的样式，一个整数的本地名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuiltinStyle>常量或表示样式的对象。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid constants, consult the Microsoft Visual Basic Object Browser.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效的常量的列表，请参阅 Microsoft Visual Basic 对象浏览器。

trans-unit.source: When you return the style for a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control that includes more than one style, only the first character or paragraph style is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当您返回的样式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>返回包括多个样式，只有第一个字符或段落样式的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.SynonymInfo" /> that contains information from the thesaurus on synonyms, antonyms, or related words and expressions for the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.SynonymInfo" />，包含来自词库的有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中文本的同义词、反义词或相关单词和表达的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> collection that represents all the tables in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有表。

trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码将更改该书签中的表单元格的宽度。

trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style that is used to format tables in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的表格式的样式。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style that is used to format tables in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示用于设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的表格式的样式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTCSCConverterDirection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTCSCConverterDirection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word converts common expressions intact rather than converting on a character-by-character basis.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 是完整地转换常用表达式，而不是逐字符进行转换，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word uses Taiwan, Hong Kong SAR, and Macao SAR character variants.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Word 使用台湾、香港特别行政区和澳门特别行政区字符变量，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Can only be used if translating from Simplified Chinese to Traditional Chinese.
trans-unit.target: 仅当从简体中文转换为繁体中文时才可使用。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified range of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control from Traditional Chinese to Simplified Chinese or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的指定范围从繁体中文转换为简体中文，或从简体中文转换为繁体中文。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the first paragraph in the document and then converts the text in the bookmark from Traditional Chinese to Simplified Chinese or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控制文档，然后将第一个段落的文本在书签中从繁体中文为简体中文，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A> property returns the plain, unformatted text of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A>属性返回的书签未格式化文本。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the text of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性的文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件被替换。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not delete the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性不会删除书签。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a bookmark that spans multiple table cells will set the text within the first cell only.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>跨越多个表格单元格的书签的属性将在第一个单元格内设置的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the bookmark contains the entire table and surrounding text, the entire table will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果该书签所包含的整个表和周围文本，将删除整个表。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a bookmark that overlaps another bookmark, see [Bookmark Control](/visualstudio/vsto/bookmark-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>重叠另一个书签的书签属性请参阅[书签控件](/visualstudio/vsto/bookmark-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text and then displays the total number of characters in the bookmark using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ComputeStatistics%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有文本控件，然后在书签中使用显示的字符总数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.ComputeStatistics%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TextRetrievalMode" /> object that controls how text is retrieved from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TextRetrievalMode" /> 对象，该对象控制从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件检索文本的方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TextRetrievalMode" /> object that controls how text is retrieved from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TextRetrievalMode" /> 对象，控制从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件检索文本的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document, hides the third word in the bookmark, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.TextRetrievalMode%2A> so that hidden text is not included.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到文档中，第三个单词中的书签的地方和集的隐藏的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.TextRetrievalMode%2A>以便不包括隐藏的文本。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the text of the bookmark in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 它然后会显示在消息框中的书签的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> collection that represents the tables at the outermost nesting level in the range of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> 集合，该集合表示位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件范围中最外层嵌套级别的表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> collection that represents the tables at the outermost nesting level in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> 集合，表示位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件范围中最外层嵌套级别的表。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a collection containing only those tables at the outermost nesting level within the context of the range of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的集合包含仅最外层的上下文的范围内嵌套这些表格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件。

trans-unit.source: These tables may not be at the outermost nesting level within the entire set of nested tables.
trans-unit.target: 这些表不能在整个外面的嵌套级别设置的嵌套表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the table in the document, then pastes the table, as a nested table, to the third cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件到文档中的表，然后将该表粘贴，为嵌套表，到第三个单元格。

trans-unit.source: The code then selects the next table in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码在书签中选择下一个表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word sets two lines of text in one and specifies the characters, if any, that enclose the text in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将两行文本设置为一行，并指定包围 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的文本的字符（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.TwoLinesInOne%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType.wdTwoLinesInOneNoBrackets> sets two lines of text in one without enclosing the text in any characters.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.TwoLinesInOne%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType.wdTwoLinesInOneNoBrackets>设置两个行文本中另一个未括在文本中的任何字符。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.TwoLinesInOne%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType.wdTwoLinesInOneNone> restores a line of combined text to two separate lines.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.TwoLinesInOne%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType.wdTwoLinesInOneNone>还原到两个单独的行组合文本行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.TwoLinesInOne%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType.wdTwoLinesInOneCurlyBrackets>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>具有到文档，然后设置的文本控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.TwoLinesInOne%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdTwoLinesInOneType.wdTwoLinesInOneCurlyBrackets>。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of underline applied to the text of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的文本的下划线类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnderline" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdUnderline" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then underlines the third word in the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>使用文档，然后下划线的文本中控制书签中的第三个单词。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the available co-authoring updates in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的所有可用共同创作更新。

trans-unit.source: The available co-authoring updates in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中的可用共同创作更新。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used only in co-authoring enabled documents.
trans-unit.target: 可以仅在共同创作启用的文档中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to access this property on a document that is not enabled for co-authoring, you will receive a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试访问此属性的文档中未启用共同创作，你将收到<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Co-authoring is not enabled in the document that contains the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 包含书签的文档中未启用共同创作。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Expands a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to include the entire story.
trans-unit.target: 扩展 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件以包含整个文章。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds text to the document and then adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> with text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将文本添加到文档并将<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>与文本。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.WholeStory%2A> method, it expands the bookmark to include the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.WholeStory%2A>方法，它会扩展书签，使其包括整个文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> in the Word Open XML format.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中具有 Word Open XML 格式的内容。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the contents of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> in the Word Open XML format.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 中具有 Word Open XML 格式的内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> collection that represents all the words in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有单词。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> collection that represents all the words in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> 集合，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有单词。

trans-unit.source: Punctuation and paragraph marks in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control are included in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words> collection.
trans-unit.target: 中的标点和段落标记<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件包括在<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the first paragraph, then changes the font color of the bookmark to blue.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件与文本发送到第一个段落，然后将更改为蓝色的书签的字体颜色。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的 XML 文本。

trans-unit.source: The XML text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的 XML 文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.XML%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.XML%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the text of the XML without the Word XML markup; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要返回的而不使用 Word XML 标记中; XML 文本否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.XML%2A> property without specifying a parameter, it returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark_XMLType> object that is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.XML%2A>未指定参数的属性，它返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark_XMLType>不应在代码中直接使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then inserts XML text into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到文档，然后将 XML 文本插入书签。

trans-unit.source: A message box then displays the total number of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes> and the XML content of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 一个消息框，然后显示总数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes>和书签的 XML 内容。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents the collection of all XML elements within a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control, including those elements that are only partially within the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的所有 XML 元素的集合，其中包括那些仅部分位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control to the document and then inserts XML text into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到文档，然后将 XML 文本插入书签。

trans-unit.source: A message box then displays the total number of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes> and the XML content of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 一个消息框，然后显示总数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes>和书签的 XML 内容。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents the parent node of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的父节点。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents the parent node of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的父节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inserts XML into the document and creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control on the second word.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例插入到文档中的 XML，并创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>上第二个字的控件。

trans-unit.source: It then inserts additional XML into the bookmark and displays the text of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.XMLParentNode%2A> in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其他 XML 插入到书签，并显示的文本<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.XMLParentNode%2A>消息框中。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> object in the same location as the existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在与现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件相同的位置创建一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The new bookmark is a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> object rather than a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 新书签将变为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>对象而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark?displayProperty=fullName>控件。
